issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
I have created an app using the commonJS spec. Using instruments the live memory is approx 3.5mb once the app tabs are loaded.

When i use take photo, either with allow editing = true or allow editing = false, i receive a memory warning and the next touch event will cause the app to blank out and you have to reboot.

Let me know if you need more information but there isn't much more to say. I haven't had this happen in other apps i've used.
fields.summary: Taking a picture with the camera I get a 'received memory warning' in xCode console and next touch event blanks screen
fields.environment: iPhone 4S iOS 5.0.1 Titanium SDK 1.8.2 (happened in 1.8.1 also)

comments.body:
Hey James,

Could you please attach a sample project which allows us to reproduce this problem? This will help us look into the issue asap and fix it. Thanks!

Junaid
We can't reproduce it using our sample. Please send us your sample and steps to test it.
